mapper.insert: insert into m_user( user_id , password , user_name , birthday , age , gender , department_id, role ) values ( #{userId}, #{password} , #{userName}, #{birthday}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{departmentId}, #{role} )
mapper.select: select user_id , password , user_name , birthday , age , gender , department_id, role from m_user
select user_id , password , user_name , birthday , age , gender , department_id, role from m_user where user_id = #{userId}
